comment:
"Incredible experience with Longreads.com. I submitted a piece that I'd already written, re-written, and extensively edited for consideration. Within a couple of weeks an editor I admire and respect contacted me with interest. And, I have to say, she lived up to my hype. All of her suggestions and comments made my piece stronger and further clarified my points. She understood its intent and purpose, and at no time did she push her own agenda or try to assert her voice. Just a gem! The layout, accompanying photo, rollout, and promotion for this piece made me certain I went with the right publication and--as ridiculous as it sounds--proud to have written it. It is now two months later and the essay is still getting hits and growing in social media presence.

Payment was lickety-split. I received a check less than four weeks after the article was published."
relationship: Submission/spec (piece was written prior and then submitted for publication)
